title: Manyu-Wana 1 (A)
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Aboriginal Australians - Language - Study and teaching

Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Language and languages - Study and teaching
description: Episode number 1 of Series "Manyu-Wana (A)". This program contains the following topics: Magic; number 3; working as a stockman; reading of "The Man and the tree"; number 1; blowing noses; letter "M"; making hairstring; words for 'wide' and 'narrow'; car magic; bat and ball magic. Suitable for Primary, Secondary and Tertiary level students. In Warlpiri language with English subtitles.
